aiEnthusiast.title: Agentic AI & Automation Leader | 10+ years in Python, LLM Orchestration & Cloud
descriptions: I architect and deliver autonomous, agentic systems that streamline complex workflows and drive smarter decision-making across enterprise environments.
Based in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, Passionate about transforming AI research into production-grade solutions and mentoring teams to adopt agentic development best practices.

jobs.title: Technical Lead
mission: • Built a RAG system to automate financial and operational report generation from Infor CloudSuite ERP data.

• Developed a Q&A assistant (chatbot) to guide clients through business processes via chat, helping them understand formalities best suited for their new business. It retrieves insights from our private knowledge base, supports document uploads (OCR-enabled) and provides contextual URL link suggestions to ensure comprehensive, informed decision-making.
Stack: Python, LangChain, OpenAI, OCR, Prompt engineering, Pinecone, Streamlit.

• Built a Chrome extension that transforms how you engage with digital content on any active tab you're on. It enhances your browsing experience by enabling dynamic chat interactions, real-time content analysis, effortless navigation and precise information access.
Stack: Express, NodeJS, Puppeteer, LLMs, Chrome.

• Conducted a comparative analysis of FOSS LLMs (Mistral 7B & Phi 1.5) vs.OpenAI models by fine-tuning them for classification and instruction-following tasks, optimizing performance through quantization and LoRA techniques.
Stack: LLMs, Wandb, Mistral 7B, Phi 1.5, Quantization, PEFT, HuggingFace.

jobs.title: Technical Lead
mission: • Developed ML models and identified emerging trends to support data-driven decision-making.
• Created an API endpoint for building customized forecast models using Auto ARIMA and trend analysis techniques.
• Conducted data mining and performed feature engineering to enhance model performance and insights.
• Develop and enhance ETL/ELT pipelines from diverse customer data sources to ensure alignment with complex ML solution requirements.
• Articulated results and actionable recommendations for executives and cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment with business goals.
Stack: Statistical modeling · Microsoft Azure · Python · LangChain · Power BI · SQL etc

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
mission: [Applied Deep Learning on Black-Scholes Model]: Developed a neural network model using PyTorch to recreate the Black-Scholes option pricing model, achieving more accurate predictions by overcoming constant volatility assumptions and skewness limitations.

jobs.title: Intern
mission: Migrated/monitored an Angular Web Application dedicated for human resources management and planning for fast-food chains (KFC FRANCE, BURGER QUEEN, POPEY'S, etc).
